lexer

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexer.Token

  • public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for representing tokens in the bantam compiler, passed from the lexer to the parser (as the value within a java_cup Symbol).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String attribute
      attribute of the token (represented as a string -- null for no attribute)
      protected int lineNum
      starting line number of token
      protected java.lang.String name
      name of the token

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Token constructor
      Token(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String attribute, int lineNum)
      Token constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAttribute()
      Get token attribute
      java.lang.String getLexeme()
      Returns the token's lexeme (as a string) Returns the name if no attribute, otherwise, it returns the attribute
      int getLineNum()
      Get line number of token
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get token name
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return a pretty-print string representation of the token format:
